meanings.definition: A piece of candy on a stick.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a sweet lolly after dinner.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to eat lollies at birthday parties.
meanings.sent3: The lolly made my tongue tingle with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a lolly.
meanings.sent5: The lolly melted in my mouth like sugary magic.

meanings.sent1: He saved up his lolly to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She earned a lot of lolly from her lemonade stand.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had a lolly tree in my backyard!
meanings.sent4: His pockets jingled with the sound of lolly.
meanings.sent5: The shiny coins sparkled like lolly in the sunlight.
